resources.string: Retreat Serviced Apartment is located within walking distance of just 700 mtrs from the famous Swayambhunath temple, also known as The Monkey Temple. Here you can see the actual distance of Retreat from these special locations: Tribhuvan International Airport - 8 Km Shova Bhagwati Temple - 500 mtrs Kathmandu Durbar Square - 1.9 Km Pashupatinath - 5.7 Km Thamel - 2 Km
